title: THURSDAY 6/10 - TOM BRADY ON THE MEND
itunes:title: THURSDAY 6/10 - TOM BRADY ON THE MEND
description:
Tom Brady (0:08) talks about his knee injury and how long he's been dealing with the issue. Dak Prescott (0:50) ready to leave his ankle injury behind him, while teammate Amari Cooper (1:23) dealing with an injury of his own. We finally hear from Jordan Love (1:43) as he talks about his future in Green Bay. Daniel Jones (2:16) doesn't consider this a make or break year for him with the Giants. Sean Payton (2:56) ready to tailor his offense around his new QB, whoever that will be. Falcons wide receiver Calvin Ridley (3:13) not on the field as he deals with a knee injury

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
